  # First download the framework at Download.
  # Extract the package to a folder of your choice below the document root of your webserver.
  # Check the following folder permissions:
    * ./temp (and all subfolders) have to be readable & writable by the web server user
    * ./main/temp (and all subfolders) have to be readable & writable by the web server user
  # You are done.

= Requirements =

  * Webserver (mod_rewrite recommend but not necessary)
  * PHP >= 5
